duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain assigned patient rooms, waiting areas, restrooms, offices, stairways, elevators, and other areas by providing housekeeping services.
Ensure optimum sanitation and a clean environment throughout the hospital.
Utilize clean techniques by performing specialized cleaning processes, using a variety of cleaning devices.
Follow all established PPF (personal protective equipment) policies when handling chemicals and/or cleaning, including wearing gloves, masks, aprons, etc.
Participate in staff meetings and actively participate in performance improvement activities.
Ensure that customer quality expectations are met and that all customers are given courteous and caring service.

education_certification.credential: Previous housekeeping or custodial experience is preferred but not required.
Knowledge of cleaning supplies and tools preferred.
Ability to speak, read, write, and understand English.
